main event: The report documents a UFO sighting on 7 May 1958, where the observer reported two hand-shaped objects that were red-yellow and giving off flashes, observed for 30 minutes in Spring City, Tennessee.
interesting points: The UFOs were described as hand-shaped, the size of a penny, and emitting red-yellow flashes.
They were observed side by side and seen flashing intermittently for 30 minutes.
The manner of observation was ground visual with binoculars.
Weather and wind conditions at the time and place of the sighting were detailed in the report.
Despite analysis of the information and evidence, no conclusion could be reached to positively identify the objects.
sighted object: Two hand-shaped objects emitting red-yellow flashes
